result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

1:51 PM  Defendant Jovanni Cruz in court with Atty Mary Cole.  Attorney Sydney Elizabeth Star in court for State of Wisconsin. Clerk HM.  Atty Cole requests another adjmt for reasons stated on the record. Granted.   PLEAS set over to 12/21 2pm. Bond continued.   TR trails.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 21, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Assistant District Attorney Sydney Star appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney Brady.  PLEAS 10/19 1:30pm. Bond continued.  TR trails.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.
Notice to Person Posting Bond. Copy given to Jovanni Cruz at counter.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  DEFENDANT HAS UNTIL 4PM ON 6/29/22 TO SIGN BOND OR DEFENDANT WILL HAVE TO REPORT TO KENOSHA COUNTY SHERIFF TO BE TAKEN INTO CUSTODY.
  *Not to Possess or Consume Alcohol.  *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription.  *No Weapons especially firearms,  No drug paraphenalia,

313PM - 318PM   Assistant District Attorney Daniel Bernard Deida appeared for the State.
  Defendant appeared in court in person.  Clerk PU  Minutes:  The Court finds probable cause in this case today.   Def. is referred to the Public Defender.  If not eligible, def. to retain his own counsel. Court date will not be adjourned due to def.'s failure to retain counsel.   Plea of Not Guilty entered. Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 5, 2022 at 02:10 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 7, 2022 at 10:00 am.. $1000  Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry). DE has until 4pm today to post or DE must report to Kenosha County Sheriff to be taken into custody. rb
